blur_detection.description: The receipt text is sharp and clearly defined with good focus throughout the image.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed for blur correction.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt has excellent contrast with dark black text on a bright white background.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: Maintain current contrast levels in future captures.

glare_identification.description: No glare or reflection is present on the receipt surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: Continue using similar lighting conditions for future captures.

water_stains.description: No water stains, discoloration, or liquid damage is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue keeping receipts dry and properly stored.

tears_or_folds.description: Minor creasing is visible on the receipt, but all text remains completely legible.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Consider flattening receipts before scanning, though current condition is acceptable.

cut_off_detection.description: The entire receipt is visible within the frame with adequate margins on all sides.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Maintain current framing approach for complete document capture.

missing_sections.description: All standard receipt sections are present including header, line items, totals, tax information, and merchant details.
missing_sections.recommendation: Continue capturing full receipt contents in this manner.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions are blocking any part of the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: Maintain current capture technique with clean background and no obstructions.
